com.paypal.android.sdk.payments
Class PayPalPayment

java.lang.Object
  com.paypal.android.sdk.payments.PayPalPayment

public final class PayPalPayment
extends Object

Describes the transaction.

This object describes the payment request, and should be submitted to the PaymentActivity via the PaymentActivity.EXTRA_PAYMENT intent extra.

Field Summary
static  CREATOR
          required by Parcelable
static String PAYMENT_INTENT_AUTHORIZE
          Specifies a payment will be AUTHORIZED for later capture via a server call to PayPal.
static String PAYMENT_INTENT_SALE
          Specifies a payment as a SALE that will complete now.

 boolean isProcessable()
          Determine if this payment can be processed.

A payment might not be processable if, for example:
- any field is null,
- the amount is non-positive,
- the amount includes more decimal fraction digits than the currency allows,
- there's no description,
- the payment intent is not defined, or
- optional BN code contains non-alphanumeric characters.

Constructor Detail

PayPalPayment

public PayPalPayment(BigDecimal amount,
                     String currencyCode,
                     String shortDescription,
                     String paymentIntent)
Create the payment to be processed.

Parameters:
amount - Amount in the given currency to process. Must be positive.
currencyCode - ISO standard currency code
shortDescription - Description of the transaction, for display to user. Should fit on one line.
paymentIntent - PaymentIntent.SALE for an immediate payment; PaymentIntent.AUTHORIZE for payment authorization only, to be captured separately at a later time.
Method Detail

paymentDetails

public PayPalPayment paymentDetails(PayPalPaymentDetails paymentDetails)
Adds optional payment amount details (item subtotal, shipping, and tax).

Parameters:
paymentDetails - PayPalPaymentDetails object containing payment amount details.

bnCode

public PayPalPayment bnCode(String bnCode)
Adds optional Build Notation code (BN code) for partner tracking.

Parameters:
bnCode - Build Notation code ("BN code"), obtained from partnerprogram@paypal.com, for your tracking purposes. Must be alphanumeric.
Returns:
this PayPalPayment object

isProcessable

public boolean isProcessable()
Determine if this payment can be processed.

A payment might not be processable if, for example:
- any field is null,
- the amount is non-positive,
- the amount includes more decimal fraction digits than the currency allows,
- there's no description,
- the payment intent is not defined, or
- optional BN code contains non-alphanumeric characters.

Returns:
true if processable

getAmountAsLocalizedString

public String getAmountAsLocalizedString()
Get the current Locale formatted String representation of the price.

Returns:
The Locale formatted String representation of the price.
